description: Slang describing someone who refuses something at first but then loves it. Also simply means 'very good/delicious'.

examples.chinese: 在海边沙滩上芭比Q是真香奥
examples.translation: BBQ on the beach is truly delicious
Can smell coffee, smells so good

examples.chinese: 这电视剧属于是第一眼不想看,第二眼真香的剧了
examples.translation: Drama I didn't want to watch at first, but loved it on second look
